title: shrI lalitE kAnci nagara
sahitya:
shrI lalitE kAnci nagara nivAsini mahA tripurasundari mAm pAhi sundari


anupallavi

  nIlAbja daLa lOcanE sadA racita dAsajana rakSaNE nIlamEgha 
sadrsha kuntaLE mayi krpAm vitara vinata lOka pAlini


caraNam    cittam ati capalam su-sthiram kuru mama shrI kAmAkSi shivE 
pAda kamala bhaktim tava drDha tarAm dEhi karuNAnidhE
